"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder richtige information? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #kontrolle"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent or proper information? #dataprotection #privacy #control"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without proper consent or transparency. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #kontrolle (control) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations about data privacy. the use of german language and hashtags specific to the german-speaking community allows the post to resonate with a local audience and contribute to a global discussion.
